title: Let’s Keep Supporting Each Other!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Thank you very much for all your help this year. You two helped me better understand a student council president should think and act, and also......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Don’t worry about it, Shioriko. We understand.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>We’re friends. There’s no need to be so formal.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Oh, but......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I respect your ability to be so respectful like that. But we’d love to see you relax and be yourself more around us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s right. You could...... show how mad you can be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, yeah. I’d like to see that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Whaat!? Uh, umm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>We’re your older sisters, so feel free to rely on us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>We’d be really happy to help you out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eli-san, Dia-san...... Thank you so much! I sincerely appreciate your support!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
